message.entry: The handle supplied must be a patch handle
R,G,B must all be the same size.
Color arrays must all be a 3D
Color arrays must be size 2x2x2 or greater.
X,Y,Z must all be empty or all non-empty.
The size of X must match the size of R or the number of columns of R.
The size of Y must match the size of R or the number of rows of R.
The size of Z must match the size of R or the number of pages of R.
